So tell me a little about yourself, Changmin.
Sure! What would you like to know?
I have no hobbies in particular, but I enjoy hiking a lot.
There are so many beautiful mountains in Korea.
How about you, Kathy? What do you like to do in your spare time?
I also like to drive out of town.
Sure! I like to get out of the city as much as possible.
There's a lot of beautiful countryside to see.
How often do you go for a drive?
Not as often as I'd like to.
I guess I go at least once a month, though.
